channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28598|2024-09-19T13:39:44.623Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20linux%20clients
item.description: Zoom for Linux clients prior to 5.13.10 contain an HTML injection vulnerability. If a victim starts a chat with a malicious user it could result in a Zoom application crash.

item.title: CVE-2023-34119|2024-09-19T19:31:02.915Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Insecure temporary file in the installer for Zoom Rooms for Windows before version 5.15.0 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-28599|2024-09-19T13:40:50.630Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20android
item.description: Zoom clients prior to 5.13.10 contain an HTML injection vulnerability. A malicious user could inject HTML into their display name potentially leading a victim to a malicious website during meeting creation.

item.title: CVE-2023-28600|2024-09-19T19:21:20.793Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20macos%20client
item.description: Zoom for MacOSclients prior to 5.14.0 contain an improper access control vulnerability. A malicious user may be able to delete/replace Zoom Client files potentially causing a loss of integrity and availability to the Zoom Client.

item.title: CVE-2023-28603|2024-09-19T19:24:00.946Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20vdi%20windows%20meeting%20client
item.description: Zoom VDI client installer prior to 5.14.0 contains an improper access control vulnerability. A malicious user may potentially delete local files without proper permissions.

item.title: CVE-2023-34117|2024-09-19T13:45:33.778Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20client%20sdk
item.description: Relative path traversal in the Zoom Client SDK before version 5.15.0 may allow an unauthorized user to enable information disclosure via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-36533|2024-09-19T19:40:23.526Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20sdk%27s
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption in Zoom SDKs before 5.14.7 may allow an unauthenticated user to enable a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-34118|2024-09-19T19:29:43.915Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in Zoom Rooms for Windows before version 5.14.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-43583|2024-09-19T13:55:21.591Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20mobile%20app%20for%20android%2C%20zoom%20mobile%20app%20for%20ios%20and%20zoom%20sdk
item.description: Cryptographic issues Zoom Mobile App for Android, Zoom Mobile App for iOS, and Zoom SDKs for Android and iOS before version 5.16.0 may allow a privileged user to conduct a disclosure of information via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-43582|2024-09-19T13:52:36.217Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper authorization in some Zoom clients may allow an authorized user to conduct an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-34120|2024-09-19T19:32:54.852Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20windows%20client
item.description: Improper privilege management in Zoom for Windows, Zoom Rooms for Windows, and Zoom VDI for Windows clients before 5.14.0 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable an escalation of privilege via local access. Users may potentially utilize higher level system privileges maintained by the Zoom client to spawn processes with escalated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-34121|2024-09-19T19:34:39.015Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in the Zoom for Windows, Zoom Rooms, Zoom VDI Windows Meeting clients before 5.14.0 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-34116|2024-09-19T19:28:14.920Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in the Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.15.0 may allow an unauthorized user to enable an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39199|2024-09-19T13:50:58.529Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Cryptographic issues with In-Meeting Chat for some Zoom clients may allow a privileged user to conduct an information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-36537|2024-09-19T19:54:00.431Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in Zoom Rooms for Windows before version 5.14.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-28601|2024-09-19T19:22:30.273Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20for%20windows%20client
item.description: Zoom for Windows clients prior to 5.14.0 contain an improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer vulnerability. A malicious user may alter protected Zoom Client memory buffer potentially causing integrity issues within the Zoom Client.

item.title: CVE-2024-24694|2024-08-13T13:31:27.006Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27247|2024-07-25T14:38:27.038Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20macos
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for macOS before version 5.17.10 may allow a privileged user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27247|2024-04-09T17:15:27.531Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20macos
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for macOS before version 5.17.10 may allow a privileged user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-06-06T15:21:25.196Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20vdi%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27243|2024-06-04T17:46:30.360Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- see%20references
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK’s may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27242|2024-06-04T17:46:27.448Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20linux
item.description: Cross site scripting in Zoom Desktop Client for Linux before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24694|2024-04-09T17:13:08.845Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27242|2024-08-02T00:27:59.871Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20linux
item.description: Cross site scripting in Zoom Desktop Client for Linux before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27243|2024-08-02T00:28:00.293Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- see%20references
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK’s may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27247|2024-08-02T00:27:59.974Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20macos
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for macOS before version 5.17.10 may allow a privileged user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-08-02T00:27:59.863Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20vdi%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.
